mapper.select: SELECT notification_id AS notificationId, user_id AS userId, content, sent_time AS sentTime FROM notification;
SELECT notification_id AS notificationId, user_id AS userId, content, sent_time AS sentTime FROM notification WHERE notification_id = #{notificationId};
SELECT notification_id AS notificationId, user_id AS userId, content, sent_time AS sentTime FROM notification WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification (user_id, content, sent_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{sentTime});
